# Content Team Templates

Templates for content creation, editorial processes, and content management.

## Available Templates

- [Content Creation Template](./content-creation-template.md) - For creating new content pieces
- [Style Guide Template](./style-guide-template.md) - For documenting content style guidelines
- [Editorial Review Template](./editorial-review-template.md) - For content review processes
- [Content Planning Template](./content-planning-template.md) - For planning content initiatives
- [SEO Content Template](./seo-content-template.md) - For SEO-optimized content

## Usage Guidelines

### When to Use Each Template

- **Content Creation**: When creating blog posts, articles, or educational content
- **Style Guide**: When documenting brand voice, tone, and writing standards
- **Editorial Review**: When reviewing and approving content
- **Content Planning**: When planning content calendars and strategies
- **SEO Content**: When creating content optimized for search engines

### Content Best Practices

- Follow brand voice and tone guidelines
- Use clear, concise language
- Include relevant keywords naturally
- Add internal and external links
- Include calls-to-action where appropriate
- Optimize for readability and accessibility
